casebody.data:
Riley HICKMAN
v.
EXXON MOBIL CORPORATION, Exxon Mobil Oil Corporation, Humble Oil & Refining Company, Humble Oil & Refining Corporation, Chevron USA, Inc., BP Corporation North America, Inc., The Texas Company, Devon Energy Production Company, LP., Dynamic Exploration, Inc., ConocoPhillips Company, Shell Oil Company, Marathon Oil Company, Sunset Petroleum, Stone Oil Company of Baton Rouge and Al Cunningham NO. 2018-C-1463 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 20, 2018

Denied.
